00016 package pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.impl;
00017 
00018 import java.util.HashSet;
00019 import java.util.Iterator;
00020 import java.util.List;
00021 import java.util.Set;
00022 
00023 import pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.Marker;
00024 
00025 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.CameraPosition;
00026 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLngBounds;
00027 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.VisibleRegion;
00028 
00029 class DynamicNoClusteringStrategy implements ClusteringStrategy {
00030 
00031         private IGoogleMap map;
00032         private Set<DelegatingMarker> markers = new HashSet<DelegatingMarker>();
00033         private LatLngBounds visibleRegionBounds;
00034 
00035         public DynamicNoClusteringStrategy(IGoogleMap map, List<DelegatingMarker> markers) {
00036                 this.map = map;
00037                 for (DelegatingMarker marker : markers) {
00038                         if (marker.isVisible()) {
00039                                 this.markers.add(marker);
00040                         }
00041                 }
00042                 showMarkersInVisibleRegion();
00043         }
00044 
00045         @Override
00046         public void cleanup() {
00047                 markers.clear();
00048         }
00049 
00050         @Override
00051         public void onCameraChange(CameraPosition cameraPosition) {
00052                 showMarkersInVisibleRegion();
00053         }
00054 
00055         @Override
00056         public void onClusterGroupChange(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00057 
00058         }
00059 
00060         @Override
00061         public void onAdd(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00062                 if (!marker.isVisible()) {
00063                         return;
00064                 }
00065                 addMarker(marker);
00066         }
00067 
00068         @Override
00069         public void onRemove(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00070                 if (!marker.isVisible()) {
00071                         return;
00072                 }
00073                 markers.remove(marker);
00074         }
00075 
00076         @Override
00077         public void onPositionChange(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00078                 if (!marker.isVisible()) {
00079                         return;
00080                 }
00081                 if (markers.contains(marker)) {
00082                         if (visibleRegionBounds.contains(marker.getPosition())) {
00083                                 markers.remove(marker);
00084                                 marker.changeVisible(true);
00085                         }
00086                 }
00087         }
00088 
00089         @Override
00090         public void onVisibilityChangeRequest(DelegatingMarker marker, boolean visible) {
00091                 if (visible) {
00092                         addMarker(marker);
00093                 } else {
00094                         markers.remove(marker);
00095                         marker.changeVisible(false);
00096                 }
00097         }
00098 
00099         @Override
00100         public void onShowInfoWindow(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00101                 if (!marker.isVisible()) {
00102                         return;
00103                 }
00104                 if (markers.remove(marker)) {
00105                         marker.changeVisible(true);
00106                 }
00107                 marker.forceShowInfoWindow();
00108         }
00109 
00110         @Override
00111         public Marker map(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker original) {
00112                 return null;
00113         }
00114 
00115         @Override
00116         public List<Marker> getDisplayedMarkers() {
00117                 return null;
00118         }
00119 
00120         @Override
00121         public float getMinZoomLevelNotClustered(Marker marker) {
00122                 return 0.0f;
00123         }
00124 
00125         private void showMarkersInVisibleRegion() {
00126                 IProjection projection = map.getProjection();
00127                 VisibleRegion visibleRegion = projection.getVisibleRegion();
00128                 visibleRegionBounds = visibleRegion.latLngBounds;
00129                 Iterator<DelegatingMarker> iterator = markers.iterator();
00130                 while (iterator.hasNext()) {
00131                         DelegatingMarker marker = iterator.next();
00132                         if (visibleRegionBounds.contains(marker.getPosition())) {
00133                                 marker.changeVisible(true);
00134                                 iterator.remove();
00135                         }
00136                 }
00137         }
00138 
00139         private void addMarker(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00140                 if (visibleRegionBounds.contains(marker.getPosition())) {
00141                         marker.changeVisible(true);
00142                 } else {
00143                         markers.add(marker);
00144                 }
00145         }
00146 }
